artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a woman on the left in a pink and white gown with a green overgown, brown fur scarf, yellow muff, and a yellow and brown striped hat with green ribbon and bow; woman in the center in a white gown with a pink and purple striped jacket with blue fur trim, a brown muff with a blue bow, and a brown hat with plumes and a blue border; woman at right in a blue cape with brown fur trim, a white and brown striped fur muff with a pink and yellow bow, and a yellow and pink hat with a green bow and pink and brown plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Cinquième Cahier, 30 Décembre 1787
